about.title: About Me
about.text: MLOps-oriented Software Engineer with hands-on experience in AI-assisted development workflows and operating AI services in production. I focus on reliable deployment of LLM/RAG services on Kubernetes, automated ML lifecycles (data → training → validation → deployment → monitoring), and observability with Prometheus and Grafana. I think in architectures (scalability, security, integration) and work in a test-driven way with clear quality and release gates.

bullets: Built real-time data ingestion into an AI agent framework that generates source code and unit tests from requirements, with validation gates and reproducible runs.
Containerized services and integrated GitLab CI (lint/test/build, artifact & version tagging, environment promotion).
Designed prompt and context controls to improve LLM determinism; added evaluation metrics and drift checks for quality in production.
Created Grafana-style dashboards and structured logs; documented SLOs and alerting rules.
Developed CAN diagnostic frames and supported integration testing in an AUTOSAR Classic environment.
Strengthened pipeline steps for test automation and code review gates, catching regressions earlier.
Integrated components for JLR programs under automotive quality standards (e.g., MISRA-C) in collaboration with Dev, QA, and Systems teams.
Performed root-cause analysis in the Mode Manager (sleep/wake-up) and base software configuration; automated function and microcontroller I/O tests.
